001package fr.aumgn.dac2.config;
002
003import java.util.Arrays;
004import java.util.Iterator;
005import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
006import java.util.Locale;
007import java.util.Map;
008
009import org.bukkit.ChatColor;
010import org.bukkit.Material;
011
012import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.gson.GsonLoadException;
013import fr.aumgn.bukkitutils.util.Util;
014import fr.aumgn.dac2.DAC;
015
016public class Colors implements Iterable<Color> {
017
018    private final Color[] colors;
019
020    public Colors(DAC dac) {
021        Color[] colorsTmp;
022        try {
023            colorsTmp = dac.getPlugin().getGsonLoader()
024                    .loadOrCreate("colors.json", Color[].class);
025            if (colorsTmp.length < 2) {
026                dac.getLogger().severe("Unable to load colors.json. " +
027                        "Using defaults colors instead.");
028                colorsTmp = getDefaults(dac.getConfig().getLocale());
029            }
030        } catch (GsonLoadException _) {
031            colorsTmp = getDefaults(dac.getConfig().getLocale());
032            try {
033                dac.getPlugin().getGsonLoader()
034                    .write("colors.json", colorsTmp);
035            } catch (GsonLoadException __) {
036                dac.getLogger().info("Unable to write default color.json.");
037            }
038        }
039
040        colors = colorsTmp;
041    }
042
043    public Color random() {
044        return colors[Util.getRandom().nextInt(colors.length)];
045    }
046
047    public Map<String, Color> toMap() {
048        Map<String, Color> map = new LinkedHashMap<String, Color>();
049        for (Color color : colors) {
050            map.put(color.name, color);
051        }
052
053        return map;
054    }
055
056    public Iterator<Color> iterator() {
057        return Arrays.asList(colors).iterator();
058    }
059
060    private static Color[] getDefaults(Locale locale) {
061        if (locale.getLanguage().equals(Locale.FRENCH.getLanguage())) {
062            return new Color[] {
063                    createDefault("Rouge",   ChatColor.DARK_RED,     14),
064                    createDefault("Vert",    ChatColor.DARK_GREEN,   13),
065                    createDefault("Argent",  ChatColor.GRAY,          8),
066                    createDefault("Violet",  ChatColor.DARK_PURPLE,  10),
067                    createDefault("Orange",  ChatColor.GOLD,          1),
068                    createDefault("Blanc",   ChatColor.WHITE,         0),
069                    createDefault("Jaune",   ChatColor.YELLOW,        4),
070                    createDefault("Magenta", ChatColor.RED,           2),
071                    createDefault("Gris",    ChatColor.DARK_GRAY,     7),
072                    createDefault("Citron",  ChatColor.GREEN,         5),
073                    createDefault("Rose",    ChatColor.LIGHT_PURPLE,  6),
074                    createDefault("Noir",    ChatColor.BLACK,        15)
075            };
076        }
077
078        return new Color[] {
079                createDefault("Red",     ChatColor.DARK_RED,     14),
080                createDefault("Green",   ChatColor.DARK_GREEN,   13),
081                createDefault("Silver",  ChatColor.GRAY,          8),
082                createDefault("Purple",  ChatColor.DARK_PURPLE,  10),
083                createDefault("Orange",  ChatColor.GOLD,          1),
084                createDefault("White",   ChatColor.WHITE,         0),
085                createDefault("Yellow",  ChatColor.YELLOW,        4),
086                createDefault("Magenta", ChatColor.RED,           2),
087                createDefault("Gray",    ChatColor.DARK_GRAY,     7),
088                createDefault("Lemon",   ChatColor.GREEN,         5),
089                createDefault("Pink",    ChatColor.LIGHT_PURPLE,  6),
090                createDefault("Black",   ChatColor.BLACK,        15)
091        };
092    }
093
094    private static Color createDefault(String name, ChatColor chat, int data) {
095        return new Color(name, chat, Material.WOOL, (byte) data);
096    }
097}
